author: kkolinko
msg: Save contexts[pos] is a local variable.
Skip versions lookup when there is the only version available.

author: tomaz
msg: Fix links on the media page add more versions of the logo.

author: kkolinko
msg: Make sure that context.versions array always has at least 1 element.
Do not assign 0-length array to this field.

author: kkolinko
msg: Assert that MappingData object is empty before performing mapping work.
The old code just skipped all work in that case, but I do not see why that would be useful,
and it may return inconsistent results.
The comet and async examples do work successfully with this change.
This allows to simplify the code in Mapper.internalMap() by removing a number of checks.
